column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh: A man driving a car (who was suspected of being drunk and disobeying traffic laws) hit a dividerm causing the car to overturn at 3.30 am  on August 4
column4: 2020 along Street 271 near Chea Sim Samaki School in Sangkat Stung Meanchey 1
column7: a white Corolla with license plate Phnom Penh 2E-8017 was seen at high speed before it hit the divider and overturned. The driver crawled out of the car
column8: and suffered minor injuries. After the accident
column9: the vehicle was stored at the Traffic Office of the Phnom Penh Municipal Police to wait for a solution later. ------NKD
